skillTree.name: Slann's Mandate
skillTree.description: The orders will be carried out with exacting precision.

skillTree.name: Commanding Visage
skillTree.description: Those who do not obey will know fear.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: -10% for enemy armies starting their turn in this province

skillTree.name: Meticulous Plans
skillTree.description: Passed on to their Skink attendants, the Slann provide guidance and direction to those nearest them.

skillTree.name: Astral Oracle
skillTree.description: The secrets of the Old Ones interpreted.

effects.description: Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Regenerative Magics
skillTree.description: Winds woven to bolster and heal.

skillTree.name: Nature's Bond
skillTree.description: The Slann binds itself to the creatures of the forest, quickening their stride and protecting them from harm.

effects.description: Speed: +15% for Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Dread Saurian units
Armour: +15 for Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Dread Saurian units

skillTree.name: Wrath of Nature
skillTree.description: The bestial hunting grounds expand at the Slann mage's behest.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +20% for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
Weapon strength: +10% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Missile strength: +10% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units

skillTree.name: Warding Wind
skillTree.description: The wind carries with it the scent of beast urine and pheromones.

skillTree.name: Enchanted Vines
skillTree.description: These slithering vines protect the Slann and his force as it travels through the Lustrian jungle.

skillTree.name: Wind Walking
skillTree.description: This force can travel seemingly impossible distances in the blink of an eye.

effects.description: Recruitment duration: -1 turn for all units (minimum 1)

skillTree.name: Unfathomable Presence
skillTree.description: The Mage-Priest's thought patterns are so alien that they are even beyond the perception of enemy Wizards.

skillTree.name: Soul of Stone
skillTree.description: Cold, merciless, without pity, obeying only logic. Hardened against magic's ill-effects.

skillTree.name: The Harrowing Scrutiny
skillTree.description: Within the Slann's gaze shines the cold-blooded scrutiny of the Old Ones.

skillTree.name: Transcendent Healing
skillTree.description: When wounded, the Slann's sheer force of will literally recombines his body.

ui_effects.description: âž• Restores 4 Hit Points per second
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: The Harrowing Scrutiny
skillTree.description: Within the Slann's gaze shines the cold-blooded scrutiny of the Old Ones.

skillTree.name: Higher State of Consciousness
skillTree.description: "Everywhere we shine, death and life burn into something newâ€¦"

skillTree.name: Unfathomable Presence
skillTree.description: The Mage-Priest's thought patterns are so alien that they are even beyond the perception of enemy Wizards.

skillTree.name: Transcendent Healing
skillTree.description: When wounded, the Slann's sheer force of will literally recombines his body.

ui_effects.description: âž• Restores 4 Hit Points per second
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Reserves of Eldritch Energy
skillTree.description: The power of the Old Ones, stored for future use so that - at precisely the right time - the Great Plan may be advanced.

skillTree.name: Becalming Cogitation
skillTree.description: Contemplation is the path to alignment, to the correct interpretation of the Great Plan.

effects.description: Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -15

skillTree.name: Arcane Convergence
skillTree.description: All shall be one, as it is written.

skillTree.name: Soul of Stone
skillTree.description: Cold, merciless, without pity, obeying only logic. Hardened against magic's ill-effects.

skillTree.name: Awakening of the Wood
skillTree.description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.

ui_effects.description: âž• Deals 35 0 damage per second (15m)
âž• Causes magical damage
âž• Large explosion area
âž– Weak against armour
âž• Deals 35 0 damage per second (15m)
âž• Causes magical damage
âž• Large explosion area
âž– Weak against armour

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Awakening of the Wood"

skillTree.name: Flesh to Stone
skillTree.description: This spell temporarily transforms allies' mortal flesh into unbreakable rock, increasing tenfold their resistance to attack.

ui_effects.description: âž•Entities cannot die while ability is active
âž•Entities cannot die while ability is active
âž•Entities cannot die while ability is active
âž•Entities cannot die while ability is active
âž•Entities cannot die while ability is active

Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flesh to Stone Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Flesh to Stone Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Life Bloom
skillTree.description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.

ui_effects.description: âž• Triggers when casting spell
âž• Restores up to 400 Hit Points
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Earth Blood
skillTree.description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

ui_effects.description: âž• Restores up to 700 Hit Points
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: Shield of Thorns
skillTree.description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

ui_effects.description: âž• Good against AP damage
âž• Good against AP damage
âž• Good against AP damage
âž• Good against AP damage

Miscast base chance: -10% for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Regrowth
skillTree.description: By speaking Druthandor's name the Wizard is able to heal allies' injuries much faster than by natural means.

ui_effects.description: âž• Restores up to 1500 Hit Points
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

skillTree.name: The Dwellers Below
skillTree.description: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Proud Warrior
skillTree.description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

skillTree.name: Skirmisher
skillTree.description: This seasoned warrior understands irregular combat perfectly: when to attack, when to hold back, when to withdraw behind heavier lines.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +3% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Missile strength: +3% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units
Weapon strength: +3% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Weapon strength: +5% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +5% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Missile strength: +5% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units
Weapon strength: +5% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Melee defence: +4 for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Melee defence: +4 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Weapon strength: +10% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +10% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Missile strength: +10% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units
Weapon strength: +10% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Melee defence: +6 for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Melee defence: +6 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units

skillTree.name: Swift Rider
skillTree.description: Only the finest beast riders can hang on whilst their mounts crash through the jungle undergrowth or smash through the foe's ranks.

effects.description: Speed: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Weapon strength: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Speed: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Missile strength: +5% for Terradon Riders units
Weapon strength: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Speed: +15% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Missile strength: +10% for Terradon Riders units

skillTree.name: Sacred Guardian
skillTree.description: It is a great honour to direct the elite warriors who protect the Plan from calamity.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
Melee attack: +4 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
Melee defence: +4 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
Melee attack: +6 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
Melee defence: +6 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units

skillTree.name: Hunt Leader
skillTree.description: The most intelligent hunter tends to move swiftly up the chain of command.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
Weapon strength: +5% for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
Melee attack: +4 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
Weapon strength: +10% for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
Melee attack: +6 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units

skillTree.name: Beast Driver
skillTree.description: The largest, most aggressive creatures - usually the oldest bulls of the herd - must be directed, lest their independent spirit lead them astray.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Missile strength: +3% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Weapon strength: +5% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Melee defence: +4 for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Missile strength: +5% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Weapon strength: +10% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Melee defence: +6 for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Missile strength: +10% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units

skillTree.name: Jungle Dominion
skillTree.description: The unforgiving law of the jungle is most clear on matters of ascendancy.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +10 for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Spawn-Kin
skillTree.description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection â€“ a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 15% for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units  (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units  (Rank 7 and above)
Leadership: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Soul Bound
skillTree.description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Epicentrist
skillTree.description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +15 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
Leadership: +5 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Xokha's Vigour
skillTree.description: Tireless in their obedience.

skillTree.name: Quetzl's Design
skillTree.description: Those who oppose the Great Plan will be destroyed.

skillTree.name: Tepok's Wisdom
skillTree.description: To be prepared is the Slann way.

skillTree.name: Huanchi's Speed
skillTree.description: Must go faster, must go faster!

skillTree.name: Slann Fury
skillTree.description: Ancient rage, when directed to action, is unstoppable.

skillTree.name: Honour Guards
skillTree.description: The older, more experienced Lizardmen are stronger than the fresh spawns.

effects.description: Units gain +1% weapon and missile strength per rank achieved

skillTree.name: Ancient Power
skillTree.description: The Slann collective consciousness is the most powerful magical force in the world.

skillTree.name: Becalming Conscious
skillTree.description: The violent winds abate at the behest of the venerable Slann.

skillTree.name: Purpose Defined
skillTree.description: Some must fall so that others will carry out the Great Plan.

skillTree.name: Geomantic Resistance
skillTree.description: From the power of the Old Ones, a small amount of protection can be forged.

skillTree.name: Foreseen Consequences
skillTree.description: The Lizardmen know what they do, and they do it with perfect obedience.

skillTree.name: Unified Consciousness
skillTree.description: The powerful Slann's mind is connected even to the lesser castes. The connection strengthens with age.

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Geomantic Sustenance
skillTree.description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Gifts of the Jungle
skillTree.description: Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

skillTree.name: Second Generation
skillTree.description: Slann of this spawning generation are powerful magic-users able to command the Winds of Magic to their will.

ui_effects.description: âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 200 100 damage and 200 100 explosion damage (12m)
âž• Causes magical damage

skillTree.name: Third Generation
skillTree.description: Spawned via sacred rites, third generation Slann are adept at controlling the Winds of Magic to the Lizardmen's advantage.

ui_effects.description: âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 200 100 damage and 200 100 explosion damage (12m)
âž• Causes magical damage

skillTree.name: Fourth Generation
skillTree.description: So powerful is their affinity with the Winds that even a fourth generation spawning produces Slann with impressive spellcasting abilities.

ui_effects.description: âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 200 100 damage and 200 100 explosion damage (12m)
âž• Causes magical damage

skillTree.name: Fifth Generation
skillTree.description: Last generation of Slann can still command the Winds of Magic to their will without any outcomes.

ui_effects.description: âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 200 100 damage and 200 100 explosion damage (12m)
âž• Causes magical damage
